name: DERE EVIL .EXE
description: DERE EVIL .EXE is both a terrifying thriller with a gripping meta horror story and a retro 16-bit pixel platformer with unique puzzles and obstacles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.5GHz Intel/AMD CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb Graphics Card Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: On-board sound
